mapper.select: SELECT a.exerciselog_id, b.exercise_name, a.exercise_duration, a.exercise_kcal, a.effort_level, a.exercise_datetime FROM exerciselog a JOIN exercise b ON a.exercise_id = b.exercise_id WHERE a.exerciselog_id = #{exerciselogId}

SELECT a.exerciselog_id, b.exercise_name, a.exercise_duration, a.exercise_datetime FROM exerciselog a JOIN exercise b ON a.exercise_id = b.exercise_id WHERE a.member_no = #{memberNo} ORDER BY a.exerciselog_id DESC
